input.sentences: on the weekends i play my guitar at a local restaurant .
i play many different tunes that my friends sing along to .
here is my friend [male] | he came out to support me .
[male] brought his brother along to hear me play .
here is the entire gang at the end of another great show !
output.sentences: This weekend I played my lute at a local restaurant.
I made sure to tune my instrument before I started to sing and play it in front of the crowd.
My friend Joe heard I was playing so he came along with to play backup tambourine.
The patrons enjoyed hearing us play and the restaurants paid us in wine.
The entire gang ended up making it out that night to hear us play, it was a blast.
